identity.mission: Redesign OMNISupply.io to be a top-tier industrial procurement platform.

design_theme.visual_mood: Clean white surfaces, strong blue accents, high data density without clutter

usage.headings: Bold, tight tracking for section titles and product names.
usage.body: Regular weight, high legibility for descriptions and specs.
usage.mono: Use for SKU numbers, Part IDs, and technical codes.

accent.description: Safety Amber/Orange for warnings or high-priority actions

layout_strategy.spacing_scale: Generous outer spacing, dense inner spacing for data components.
rules: Catalog pages must use a dense grid (3-4 columns) for product cards.
Product details must use a 2-column layout (Image | Specs).
Always maintain optical alignment for text and icons.

elements: Add to Cart Button (Full width or prominent)
ProductCard.interaction: Hover: Slight lift, border color change to Primary.

SpecTable.style: Striped rows, dense padding (py-2 px-4), mono font for values.
SpecTable.usage: Product Detail Modal and Comparison View.

Navigation.style: Infosys style: Clean white bar, blue active states, mega-menu for categories.

visual_enhancers.shadows: Subtle, diffuse shadows (shadow-sm, shadow-md). No harsh drops.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid #E2E8F0. Use borders to define structure, not backgrounds.
visual_enhancers.radius: rounded-md (6px) or rounded-lg (8px). Avoid fully rounded corners for main containers.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use sparingly for sticky headers or modal overlays (backdrop-blur-md).

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'LanguageSelector' immediately in the header.
Refactor the Product Card to match the 'Grainger-style' definition.
Ensure the Product Detail Modal includes a dense 'SpecTable'.
Use the provided image URLs for dummy data.
Apply the 'Infosys Blue' (#007CC3) consistently as the primary brand color.
Use 'IBM Plex Sans' for all body text and data displays.
Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds; use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
Ensure high contrast for text (WCAG AA compliance).
Prioritize Shadcn UI components but customize them to match the design theme.
